Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class Library

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Library
public class Library extends Object
Represents a Library that manages readers and writers trying to access its resources. This class ensures synchronized access to its resources, following the readers-writers problem.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library()
    Default constructor.
    Library(int maxPeopleInside)
    Constructs a Library with a specified maximum number of readers allowed inside.

    Method
    Description

    finishRead(int readerId)
    Handles a reader's request to finish reading and leave the library.

    Handles a writer's request to finish writing and leave the library.

    Handles a reader's request to enter the library and read.

    Handles a writer's request to enter the library and write.

  • Constructor Details

    • Library

      public Library()
      Default constructor. Initializes the library with a default maximum of 5 readers allowed inside.

    • Library

      public Library(int maxPeopleInside)
      Constructs a Library with a specified maximum number of readers allowed inside.
      Parameters:
      maxPeopleInside - the maximum number of readers allowed inside the library at one time.

  • Method Details

    • requestRead

      public void requestRead(int readerId) throws InterruptedException
      Handles a reader's request to enter the library and read.
      Parameters:
      readerId - the ID of the reader requesting access.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • finishRead

      public void finishRead(int readerId)
      Handles a reader's request to finish reading and leave the library.
      Parameters:
      readerId - the ID of the reader finishing their reading session.

    • requestWrite

      public void requestWrite(int writerId) throws InterruptedException
      Handles a writer's request to enter the library and write.
      Parameters:
      writerId - the ID of the writer requesting access.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • finishWrite

      public void finishWrite(int writerId)
      Handles a writer's request to finish writing and leave the library.
      Parameters:
      writerId - the ID of the writer finishing their writing session.
